Articles.Content:
Hello,

I propose here a challenge that will transform Kerbal Space Program into Kerbal Warfare Program.

Anyone wanted to show off their latest invention in mass destruction/havoc weaponry ? Time has paid, and we shall see through this challenge.

This is a challenge regrouping the most ingenious, most creative, most powerful, and most impressing designs.

* * *
**RULES :**
**Objective :** Build a missile detaching into several bombs, aslo known as a Cluster missile. You may detonate it wherever you see fit, and detaching process may occur wherever you see fit. Your Cluster, your way !

**Restrictions :** What is classed as a bomb is a small end payload detached from the Cluster or Sub-Cluster that possess no propulsion method, else it will be considered a Sub-Cluster. A bomb must NOT be made of only a decoupler/separator or it will be considered as a debris. 

**Mods :** Any major mods may be used, except for weaponry orientated mods (like BDArmory). The use of cheat mods (such as MechJebÃ‚Â² and HyperEdit) are forbidden.

**Variants :** For interstellar mod, you may build special cluster missiles such as Nuclear/Radiating. All of it will count towards the terror factor (described below).

**Entry :** The price of the missile must be specified by a screenshot / video of the VAB or else the Entry will not be counted for Efficiency.

Further rules bay be enacted if judged necessary.

* * *

**LEADERBOARD :**

The leaderboard will be divised into 4 categories : The most clustered (More bombs are better), The most efficient (more bang for the buck), The most terrorizing (Civilians will scream), The most ingenious (Creation is key!)

288 Bombs.

BTW, How is Mechjeb a "cheat mod"; all it does is provide information about the craft and several autopilots. I used KER in mine just FYI. It's pretty hard to do this challenge without encountering the Kraken, as I had several similar designs to this (one with about 1500 bombs) that kept getting hit by the kraken on launch.... so yeah.
A new rule is being enacted : Cluster Missile must be able to reach Sub-Orbital flight. This is to prevent enormous bombs detonating on the Launchpad without flight.
How exactly is blast radius calculated?
It is calculated by the biggest spread of most of the debris before impact. The spread is truncated and rounded up to ~0.1km.
